welcome: Welcome to the DEVINE GuessWhat game.
Greetings! My name is Johnny Zero
ask_to_play: Do you want to play the GuessWhat game with me?
You bet you can beat me in a questions game?
My calculations reveals that you are here to play with me. Shall we begin?
instructions: Good! So now think about one of the objects on the table, and I will ask you some questions in order to find it.
ask_got_it_right: Hmmm, I think it's the {object_name}. Did I get it right ?
ask_play_again: Would you like to play again ?
Do you want to play again with me ?
